metadata.description: One is a villain that has been plaguing civilization since the time of the Pharaohs. The other is the deadliest vampire to ever walk the earth. It's the battle to end all battles as Apocalypse confronts Dracula! Enemies since the Crusades, they've met again in 19th century London. It's a series of Victorian mayhem!
metadata.name: X-Men: Apocalypse/Dracula
